## Dr Jo Saul

Dr Jo Saul is the leader of the ISLaND Lab and a Dorothy Hodgkin Research Fellow. She completed her PhD at UCL in 2020, supervised by Professor Courtenay Norbury in UCL's Department of Language and Cognition.

Jo is a member of [the LiLaC lab](http://www.lilac-lab.org/).

![](images/Profile.jpg){width=50%}

View Jo's CV [here](other/CV_web.pdf)

View her Google Scholar profile [here](https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=list_works&hl=en&user=lOhuIhkAAAAJ).

## Cassie Wong

Cassie is completing a Summer internship in the ISLaND lab. She is a 3rd Year BSc/MSci student who completed her dissertation using data from Jo's PhD this year.

## Join us!

We hope to grow the lab steadily over the next few years - head to 'Get involved' to find out about potential opportunities to join us or collaborate.
